name: Eyy, la-cow!
description:
Controls

  • Movement: WASD
  • Abduct: SPACE
  • Start game/restart game: SPACE or click Start

---------------------

MESSAGE FROM COMMAND!

SUBJECT: NEW MISSION

BODY: ABDUCT COWS! AS MANY AS POSSIBLE! ALL THAT YOU CAN! AS A REMINDER, COWS ARE THE ONES THAT GO 'MOO!'. THEY DO NOT HAVE FLUFFY COATS. THOSE ARE SHEEP! DO NOT BRING US SHEEP! WE DO NOT LIKE THEM! BE ADVISED THAT THE EARTHLINGS ARE ON TO US! DO NOT LET THEM CATCH YOU!

SIGNED--COMMAND

P.S. IF YOU SEE JEBEDIAH TELL HIM WE MISS HIM--HE IS ONE OF THE GOOD ONES!
